title: MoMA stabbing suspect worked on Broadway, suffered from worsening mental health issues, friends recall - Gothamist
content:
1. MoMA stabbing suspect worked on Broadway, suffered from worsening mental health issues, friends recall  Gothamist
  2. NYPD releases shocking video of stabbing attack at NYC's Museum of Modern Art  Fox News
  3. Hunt continues for suspect in Museum of Modern Art double stabbing  CBS New York
  4. Suspected MoMA stabber rants on social media as cops continue hunt  New York Post
  5. MoMA stabbing suspect caught on video during horrifying attack  Eyewitness News ABC7NY

description: People who say they know the 60-year-old man accused of stabbing two employees at the Museum of Modern Art became increasingly hostile online in the weeks leading up to Saturday's attack.
